title: Dua When In Anger
arabic: اَعُوْذُ بِاللهِ مِنَ الشَّيْطَانِ الرَّجِيْمِ
translation: A’oozu Bil’laahi Minash Shaitaanir Rajeem
meaning: I seek refuge in Allah from Shaitaan the cursed

title: When Finished Eating
arabic: اَ لْحَمْدُ للهِ الَّذِىْ اَطْعَمَنَا وَسَقَاناَ وَجَعَلَناَ مِنَ الْمُسْلِمِيْنَ
translation: Alhumdu lil laahil Lazee At’amana Wa Saqaana Wa Ja’alana Minal Muslimeen
meaning: All Praise is due to Allah, who has blessed us with food and drink and made us from amongst the Believers (Muslims)

title: When Leaving Home
arabic: بِسْمِ اللهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ عَلىَ اللهِ وَلاَ حَوْلَ وَلاَ قُوَّةَ اِلاَّ بِاللهِ ط
translation: Bismil laahi Tawak’kaltu Alal laahi Wa Laa Hawla Wa Laa Quw’wata il’la bil’laah
meaning: Allah’s Name we begin with, I place my (full) trust in Allah and there is no Might and Power except with Allah

title: When entering Home
arabic: بِسْـمِ اللهِ وَلَجْنـا، وَبِسْـمِ اللهِ خَـرَجْنـا، وَعَلـى رَبِّنـا تَوَكّلْـنا
translation: Bismillaahi walajnaa, wa bismillaahi kharajnaa, wa ‘alaaRabblnaa tawakkalnaa
meaning: In the Name of Allah we enter, in the Name of Allah we leave, and upon our Lord we depend [then say As-Salaamu ‘Alaykum to those present]

title: Before starting a Journey
arabic: سُبْحَانَ الَّذِي سَخَّرَ لَنَا هَذَا، وَمَا كُنَّا لَهُ مُقْرِنِينَ، وَإِنَّا إِلَى رَبِّنَا لَمُنْقَلِبُون
translation: subhaan-alladhee sakh-khara lanaa haadhaa, wa maa kunnaa lahu muqrineena, wa innaa ilaaa rabinaa la-munqaliboon
meaning: Glory to Him who has brought this [vehicle] under our control, though we were unable to control it [ourselves], and indeed, to Our Lord we will surely return.

title: When Finished Eating
arabic: اَ لْحَمْدُ للهِ الَّذِىْ اَطْعَمَنَا وَسَقَاناَ وَجَعَلَناَ مِنَ الْمُسْلِمِيْنَ
translation: Alhumdu lil laahil Lazee At’amana Wa Saqaana Wa Ja’alana Minal Muslimeen
meaning: All Praise is due to Allah, who has blessed us with food and drink and made us from amongst the Believers (Muslims)

title: Dua after every prayer
arabic: اَسْتَغْفَرُوْ ا اللهَ الَّذِيْ لَا اَلٰهَ اِلاَّ هُوَ الْحَيُّ الْقَيُّوْمُ ذُوْ الْجَلَالِ وَ الْاِكْرَامِ وَ اَتُوْبُ اِلَيْهِ
translation: Astaghferul laahal lazee laa elaaha illaa howal hayyul qayyoomo zul jalaale wal ikraame wa atoobo elayhe
meaning: I seek forgiveness of Allah Who, there is no deity other than He, the Ever-Living the Self-Subsistent the Glorious and the Gracious. I turn unto Him (repentant)

title: For protection from Hell
arabic: أَسْأَلُ اللَّهَ الْجَنَّةَ وَ أَعُوذُ بِاللَّهِ مِنَ النَّارِ
translation: As-alul Laahal Jannata Wa A-o’ozo Billaahe Menan Naar
meaning: I beseech Allah (to grant me) Paradise and I seek protection of Allah from the (Hell) Fire: at this the Hell Says: O Allah grant him/her Protection

title: For wealth & prosperity
arabic: يَا قَوِيُّ يَا غَنِيُّ يَا وَلِيُّ يَا مَلِيُّ
translation: Yaa Qawiyyo Yaa Ghaniyyo Wa Waliyyo Wa Maliyyo
meaning: O Mighty; O Self -Sufficient; O Guardian; O Absolute Authority

title: For increase of Sustenance
arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ رَبَّ السَّمَاوَاتِ السَّبْعِ وَ رَبَّ الْعَرْشِ الْعَظِيْمِ عَنَّا الدَّيْنَ وَ أَغْنِنَا مِنَ الْفَقْرِ
translation: Allaahumma Rabbas Samaawaatis Sab-e’ Wa Rabbal A’rshil A’zeeme A’nnad Dayna Wa Aghnenaa Menal Faqre
meaning: O Allah! The Lord of seven heavens. The Lord of great throne (authority), defray our debts and free us from poverty

title: For removing Worries
arabic: سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ الْعَظِيْمِ وَ بِحَمْدِهٖ أَسْتَغْفِرُ اللَّهَ وَ أَسْأَلُهٗ مِنْ فَضْلِهٖ
translation: Subhaanl Laahil A’zeeme Wa Be-hamdehi Astaghferul Laaha Wa As-alohu Min Fazlehi
meaning: The Almighty God is pure and I begin with His praise. I pray salvation from Him and supplicate His Blessings

title: Dua when studying something difficult
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ لاَ سَهْلاً إِلّاَ مَا جَعَلّتَهٌ سَهْلاً وَأَنّتَ تَجّعَلَ الحَزَنَ إِذَا شِئتَ سَهْلاً
translation: Allahumma la sahla illa ma ja‘altahu sahla wa anta taj‘alu al-hazana idha shi’ta sahla.
meaning: Oh Allah! Nothing is easy except what You have made easy. If You wish, You can make the difficult easy.

title: Dua for all Diseases
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْبَرَصِ، وَالْجُنُونِ، وَالْجُذَامِ، وَمِنْ سَيِّئِ الأَسْقَامِ
translation: Allahumma inni a’uzubika minal baros, wal junuun wal juzzam, wa min sayyi’il-asqam
meaning: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from leprosy, madness, elephantiasis, and evil diseases

title: If one forgets dua before eating
arabic: بِسْمِ الله اَوَّلَهُ وَاخِرَهُ
translation: Bismillahi Awwalahu Wa aakhirahu
meaning: In the name of Allah in it’s beginning and end

title: Dua before sleeping
arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ بِاسْمِكَ  أَمُوتُ وَأَحْيَا
translation: Allahumma Bismika Amootu Wa-ahyaa
meaning: O Allah by your name i live and die

title: Dua After Waking Up
arabic: الحَمْدُ لِلهِ الَّذِي أَحْيَانَا بَعْدَ مَا أَمَاتَنَا وَإِلَيْهِ النُّشُورُ
translation: Alhamdu Lillaahil-lazee Ahyaanaa Ba‛da Maa Mmaatanaa Wa ilayhin-Nushoor
meaning: All praise belong to Allah who gave us life after dying, and unto Him we’ll be resurrection

title: Dua before entering the toilet
arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْخُبُثِ وَالْخَبَائِثِ
translation: Allaahumma innee A‛oozu Bika Minal-khubuthi wal-khabaa’ith
meaning: O Allah. I seek refuge in You from the bad male and female evil (Jinns)

title: Dua After Coming out of the Toilet
arabic: غُفْرَانَكَ الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي أَذْهَبَ عَنِّي الْأَذَى وَعَافَانِي
translation: Ghuf-raa naka, Alhamdulillah-hilla-zee Az-haba Ann-nil azaa Wa ‘afaani
meaning: (O Allah) I seek forgiveness and pardon from You, All Praise be to Allah, who removed the difficulty from me and gave me ease (relief)

title: Dua before leaving toilet
arabic: غُفْرَانَكَ الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي أَذْهَبَ عَنِّي الْأَذٰى وَعَافَانِي
translation: Ghufranaka Alhamdulillah illadhi adhhaba anni al-adha wa ‘aafaanee
meaning: “(O Allah) I seek forgiveness and pardon from You”. All Praise be to Allah, who has taken away from me discomfort and granted me relief”. (Mishkat)

title: Dua for success
arabic: وَمَا تَوْفِيقِي إِلَّا بِاللَّهِ ۚ عَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ وَإِلَيْهِ أُنِيبُ
translation: Wama tawfeeqee illa billahiAAalayhi tawakkaltu wa-ilayhi oneeb
meaning: My success is not but through Allah. Upon him I have relied, and to Him I return

title: Dua before travelling
arabic: سُبْحَانَ الَّذِي سَخَّرَ لَنَا هَذَا وَمَا كُنَّا لَهُ مُقْرِنِينَ وَإِنَّا إِلَى رَبِّنَا لَمُنْقَلِبُونَ
translation: Subhaan-allazee Sakh-khara lanaa haazaa, Wa maa kunnaa Lahu Muqrineena, Wa innaa ilaaa Rabinaa La-munqaliboon
meaning: Glory to Him who has brought this (vehicle) under our control, though we were unable to control it, and indeed, we are to return to him

title: Dua when entering the mosque
arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ افْتَحْ لِي أَبْوَابَ رَحْمَتِكَ
translation: Allaahum-maf tah lee Abwaaba Rahmatik
meaning: O Allah, open the gates of Your mercy for me

title: Dua when leaving the mosque
arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ مِنْ فَضْلِكَ
translation: Allaa-hum-ma innee As’aluka Min fad-lik
meaning: O Allah, I ask You from Your favour

title: Dua when looking at the mirror
arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ كَمَا أَنْتَ حَسَّنْتَ خَلْقِي فَحَسِّنْ خُلُقِي
translation: Allahumma Kama Hasanta khalqi Fahassin Khuluqi
meaning: O Allah as you have given me a good physical form, so also favour me with good morals and manners

title: Dua when you are in difficulty
arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ لَا سَهْلَ إِلَّا مَا جَعَلْتَهُ سَهْلًا ، وَأَنْتَ تَجْعَلُ الْحَزْنَ إِذَا شِئْتَ سَهْلًا
translation: Allaahumma Laa Sahla illaa Maa Ja‛altahu Sahlan, Aa anta Taj‛al-ul-hazna izaa Shi’ta Sahlan
meaning: O Allah there is nothing that is easy except that You made it easy, and You can make this difficulty easy if You so wish to

title: Dua when seeing someone in difficulty
arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي عَافَانِي مِمَّا ابْتَلَاكَ بِهِ وَفَضَّلَنِي عَلَى كَثِيرٍ مِمَّنْ خَلَقَ تَفْضِيلَاً
translation: Al-hamdu Lil-laahil-ladhzee, Aafaanee Mim-mab-ta-laaka Bih, Wa fad-dala-nee, Alaa kasee-rim mim man khalaqa Taf-deelaa
meaning: All praise belongs to Allah who has saved me from such a condition which is afflicted on you and favoured me over many of his creations

title: Dua when wearing clothes
arabic: الحَمْدُ لِلهِ الَّذِي كَسَانِي هَذَا الثَّوْبَ وَرَزَقَنِيهِ مِنْ غَيْرِ حَوْلٍ مِنِّي وَلَا قُوَّةٍ
translation: alhamdu Lillaahil-lazee Kasaanee Haazas-sauwba Wa razaqaneehi Min Ghayri Hawlin Minnee Wa laa Quwwah
meaning: All praise belongs to Allah who has clothed me with this garment and provided it for me, with no power nor might from myself

title: Duas for Anxiety and Worry
arabic: لَا حَوْلَ وَلَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِاللَّهِ
translation: La hawla wa la quwwata illa billah
meaning: There is no might and no power except with Allah.

title: Daily everyday Dua
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ عِلْماً نَافِعاً، وَرِزْقاً طَيِّباً، وَعَمَلاً مُتَقَبَّلاً
translation: Allaahumma ‘innee ‘as’aluka ‘ilman naafi’an, wa rizqan tayyiban, wa ‘amalan mutaqabbalan
meaning: O Allah, I ask You for knowledge that is of benefit , a good provision , and deeds that will be accepted

title: Daily everyday Dua 2
arabic: سُبْحَانَ اللهِ ، والْحَمْدُ للهِ ، وَاللهُ أَكْبَرُ
translation: Subhaanallaahi, Walhamdu lillaahi, Wallaahu ‘Akbar
meaning: Glory is to Allah, praise is to Allah, Allah is the Most Great!

title: Daily everyday Dua 3
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الْجَنَّةَ وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ النَّارِ
translation: Allaahumma ‘innee ‘as’alukal-jannata wa ‘a’oothu bika minan-naar
meaning: O Allah , I ask You for Paradise and seek Your protection from the Fire

title: Daily every Dua 4
arabic: لاَ إِلَهَ إِلَّا أنْـت سُـبْحانَكَ إِنِّي كُنْـتُ مِنَ الظّـالِميـن
translation: Laa ‘ilaaha ‘illaa ‘Anta subhaanaka ‘innee kuntu minadh-dhaalimeen
meaning: There is none worthy of worship but You, glory is to You. Surely, I was among the wrongdoers

title: Rabbana 1
arabic: رَبَّنَا تَقَبَّلْ مِنَّا إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ السَّمِيعُ العَلِيمُ
translation: Rabbana taqabbal minna innaka antas Sameeaul Aleem
meaning: Our Lord! Accept (this service) from us: For Thou art the All-Hearing, the All-knowing

title: Dua when in hardship
arabic: يَا حَيُّ يَا قَيُّوْمُ بِرَحْمَتِكَ أَسْتَغِيْث
translation: Ya Hayyu Ya Qayyoom birahmatika astagheeth
meaning: O Ever-Living, O Sustainer, in Your Mercy I seek relief.

title: Rabbana 3
arabic: رَبَّنَآ اٰتِنَا فِي الدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةً وَّفِي الْاٰخِرَةِ حَسَـنَةً وَّقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ
translation: Rabbanaaa Aatinaa Fiddunyaa H’asanata Wa Fil Aakhirati H’asanata Wa Qinaa A’d’aaban Naar
meaning: Our Lord! Give us in this world that which is good and in the Hereafter that which is good, and save us from the torment of the Fire!

title: Rabbana 4
arabic: رَبَّنَا أَفْرِغْ عَلَيْنَا صَبْراً وَثَبِّتْ أَقْدَامَنَا وَانصُرْنَا عَلَى القَوْمِ الكَافِرِينَ
translation: Rabbana afrigh 'alayna sabran wa thabbit aqdamana wansurna 'alal-qawmil-kafirin
meaning: Our Lord! Bestow on us endurance, make our foothold sure, and give us help against the disbelieving folk

title: Rabbana 5
arabic: رَبَّنَا لَا تُزِغْ قُلُوْبَنَا بَعْدَ اِذْ ھَدَيْتَنَا وَھَبْ لَنَا مِنْ لَّدُنْكَ رَحْمَةً ۚ اِنَّكَ اَنْتَ الْوَھَّابُ
translation: Rabbanaa Laa Tuzigh Quloobanaa Ba’-Da Id’hadaytanaa Wa Hab Lanaa Mil Ladunka Rah’mah Innaka Antal Wahaab
meaning: Our Lord! Let not our hearts deviate (from the truth) after You have guided us, and grant us mercy from You. Truly, You are the Bestower

title: Dua for increased knowledge
arabic: وَقُل رَّبِّ زِدۡنِي عِلۡمٗا
translation: Rabbi Zidni Ilma
meaning: O my Lord increase me in knowledge

title: Dua for increased knowledge 2
arabic: اللهم إني أسألك علماً نافعاً، ورزقاً طيباً، وعملاً متقبلاً
translation: Allaahumma innee assaluka ilman nafia, wa rizzqan tayyeebun, wa amalan mutaqabilan
meaning: O Allaah indeed I ask You for beneficial knowledge, and a good Halal provision, and actions which are accepted

title: Dua when raining
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ صَيِّبًا نَافِعًا
translation: Allaahumma sayyiban naafi‛aa
meaning: O Allah, may it be a beneficial rain

title: Dua in times of Distress
arabic: اللهُ اللهُ ربِّي لَا أُشرِكُ به شيئًا
translation: Allah, Allah, Rabbi La Ushriku Bihi Syai'a
meaning: Allah, Allah, my Lord, I do not associate anything with Him

title: Dua of Prophet Yunus a.s.
arabic: لاَّ إِلَهَ إِلاَّ أَنتَ سُبْحَانَكَ إِنِّى كُنتُ مِنَ الظَّالِمِينَ
translation: La ilaha illa anta subhanaka inni kuntu minaz zalimin
meaning: There is no God but You, exalted are You! Indeed, I have been of the wrongdoers

title: Dua when your feeling down
arabic: يَا حَيُّ يَا قَيُّوْمُ بِرَحْمَتِكَ أَسْتَغِيْث
translation: Ya Hayyyu Ya Qayyum, bi-Rahmatika Astagheeth
meaning: O Living, O Sustaining, in Your Mercy I seek relief

title: Dua to attain calmness of the heart
arabic: رَبِّ اشْرَحْ لِي صَدْرِي وَيَسِّرْ لِي أَمْرِي وَاحْلُلْ عُقْدَةً مِّن لِّسَانِي يَفْقَهُوا قَوْلِي
translation: Rabbi-shrah li sodri, wa yassir li amri, wahlul uqdatan min lisani yafqohu qawli
meaning: Lord, lift up my heart and ease my task for me. Remove the impediment from my tongue so that they may understand my speech

title: Dua for attaining confidence in Allah
arabic: رَبَّنَا عَلَيْكَ تَوَكَّلْنَا وَإِلَيْكَ أَنَبْنَا وَإِلَيْكَ الْمَصِيرُ
translation: Robbana, ‘alaika tawakkalna, wa ilaika anabna, wa ilaikal-masir
meaning: Our Lord! In You we have placed our trust, and to You we turn in repentance, and to You is the final return

title: Dua for hardship and distress
arabic: حَسْبِيَ اللَّهُ لآ إلَهَ إلَّا هُوَ، عَلَيْهَ توَكَّلتُ، وَهُوَ رَبُّ الْعَرْشِ الْعَظِيمِ
translation: HasbiyAllahu la illaha illa Huwa, ‘alayhi tawakkaltu, wa Huwa Rabbul arshil azim
meaning: Allah is sufficient for me. There is none worthy of worship but Him. I have placed my trust in Him, and He is the lord of the Majestic Throne

title: Dua when finished eating
arabic: اَ لْحَمْدُ للهِ الَّذِىْ اَطْعَمَنَا وَسَقَاناَ وَجَعَلَناَ مِنَ الْمُسْلِمِيْنَ
translation: Alhumdu lil laahil Lazee At’amana Wa Saqaana Wa Ja’alana Minal Muslimeen
meaning: All Praise is due to Al’laah, who has blessed us with food and drink and made us from amongst the Believers (Muslims)

title: Dua for fear and anxiety
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اكْفِنِيهِمْ بِماَ شِئْتَ
translation: Allah hummak-fineeyhim bi maa shi'ta
meaning: O Allah, suffice (i.e. protect) me against them however You wish

title: Dua for forgiveness and well-being
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الْعَفْوَ وَالْعَافِيَةَ فِي الدُّنْيَا وَالآخِرَةِ
translation: Allahumma inni as’alukal-’afwa wal ‘afiyah fid-dunya wal-akhirah
meaning: O Allah, I seek Your forgiveness and my well-being in this world and the Hereafter

title: Dua for protection from evil eye
arabic: أَعُوذُ بِكلِمَاتِ الله التّامّاتِ مِن شَرّ مَا خَلَقَ
translation: A’uzu bikalimatillahit-tammaati min syarri ma kholak
meaning: I seek protection in the perfect words of Allah from every evil that has been created
